title: How to Get CS:GO on Xbox One

steps.title: Open a browser on your computer and go to CS:GO's page on the Xbox store.
steps.content: Open a browser on your computer and go to CS:GO's page on the Xbox store .

steps.title: Click Buy Game.
steps.content: Click Buy Game . This option is on the left side of the screen. You'll be prompted to sign in to your Microsoft account here if you're not already signed in.

steps.title: Move to your Xbox One and press the Xbox button.
steps.content: Move to your Xbox One and press the Xbox button. The Xbox button is the large silver button in the middle of the controller. This opens the Xbox Guide.

steps.title: Select the My Games and Apps icon and press X.
steps.content: Select the My Games and Apps icon and press X . This icon looks like a game controller next to a console and is visible on the far left of the row just under the Home option.

steps.title: Press X again to choose See All.
steps.content: Press X again to choose See All .

steps.title: Highlight Ready to Install if it's not already highlighted.
steps.content: Highlight Ready to Install if it's not already highlighted.

steps.title: Scroll through the Ready to Install list and select CS:GO.
steps.content: Scroll through the Ready to Install list and select CS:GO. This brings up a confirmation page.

steps.title: Press X to select Install All.
steps.content: Press X to select Install All . CS:GO is downloaded to your Xbox One console.
